definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
evacuation/measures to evacuate a building in an emergency

sentences.english: The new advisory covers several towns northeast of the mandatory exclusion zone.
sentences.chinese: 新提議的疏散區包括了強制隔離區東北的幾個城鎮。

sentences.english: The children is evacuate to the country when the city is is bombe.
sentences.chinese: 轟炸時，兒童都疏散到鄉下去了。

sentences.english: Only when security guards fired shots in the air did the crowd disperse.
sentences.chinese: 治安警察向空中鳴後，人羣才疏散開。

sentences.english: As they are occupied 24 hours a day, hospitals cannot be evacuated easily.
sentences.chinese: 醫院因一天24小時在使用而無法輕易進行疏散。

sentences.english: Open the doors, evacuate St. Peters square.
sentences.chinese: 打開大門，疏散聖彼得廣場的人羣。

sentences.english: In places like Ofunato, evacuation areas on higher ground were themselves blasted by the torrents.
sentences.chinese: 在大船渡市，位於高地的疏散中心都被洪流沖毀。

sentences.english: The present exits in large underground shopping center are hard to meet the requirement of emergency evacuation.
sentences.chinese: 目前大型地下商場出口難以滿足安全疏散的要求。

sentences.english: Evacuees from the area around the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Plant receive a meal at an evacuation center in Namie.
sentences.chinese: 福島第一核電站附近被疏散人員在疏散中心接受配餐。

sentences.english: Evacuees from the area around the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Plant receive a meal at an evacuation center in Namie.
sentences.chinese: 福島第一核電站附近被疏散人員在疏散中心接受配餐。

sentences.english: Exxon oil spill in Mont. river prompts evacuations.
sentences.chinese: 埃克森美孚石油泄漏至黃石河，下游居民疏散。

sentences.english: The exits, routes, stairwells are not totally blocked.
sentences.chinese: 安全出口，疏散通道，和樓梯不能完全被堵塞。

sentences.english: Formulate pre-proposal on fire fighting and emergency evacuation and organize regular fire drill.
sentences.chinese: 制定滅火和應急疏散預案，定期組織消防演練。

sentences.english: Kan said the evacuation advisory is being done for the residents' safety.
sentences.chinese: 菅直人說，依照疏散決定行事是爲了居民的安全。

sentences.english: The children evacuated to the country when the city was bombed.
sentences.chinese: 轟炸時，兒童都疏散到鄉下去了。

sentences.english: This building is on fire, you must evacuate immediately.
sentences.chinese: 這座樓着火了，大家必須立即疏散。

sentences.english: Conversant with emergency evacuation fire procedures.
sentences.chinese: 熟知緊急疏散和消防工作程序。

definition: evacuation/measures to evacuate a building in an emergency
to warn/to alert/to be on the alert/to stand guard/sentinel
to dredge/to open up a path for/to remove obstructions/to clear the way/to enlighten/persuasion
